BigNews: <CN>欧元兑日元日内上涨0.8%至159.28,为自2008年9月以来最高水平</CN><EN>The euro against the yen rose 0.8 per cent to 159.28 during the day, the highest level since September 2008</EN>

<CN>泰国11个政党宣布联盟组建新政府</CN><EN>Thailand's 11 political parties announce coalition to form new government</EN>
<CN>泰国前总理他信在流亡17年后宣布，他将在8月22日重返泰国</CN><EN>Former Thai Prime Minister Thaksin Shinawatra announced after 17 years in exile that he will return to Thailand on August 22</EN>
<CN>日本将从8月24日开始将福岛第一核电站核污染水排放入海</CN><EN>Japan will discharge nuclear-contaminated water from the Fukushima Daiichi nuclear power plant into the sea starting August 24</EN>

<CN>福岛当地百余人举行第三次污染水排海问题圆桌会议，要求暂停核污染水排海</CN><EN>More than 100 local people in Fukushima held the third roundtable meeting on the issue of polluted water discharge into the sea, demanding the suspension of the discharge of nuclear contaminated water into the sea</EN>
<CN>美国前总统特朗普在社交媒体上表示，自己将于24日前往佐治亚州富尔顿县监狱报到</CN><EN>Former U.S. President Trump stated on social media that he will report to the Fulton County Jail in Georgia on the 24th</EN>
